title: New Wave of Startups in Korea Flourishes - WSJ
text:
New Wave of Startups in Korea Flourishes New Wave of Startups in Korea Flourishes This copy is for your personal, non-commercial use only. Distribution and use of this material are governed by

Dow Jones Reprints at 1-800-843-0008 or visit www.djreprints.com. http://online.wsj.com/articles/new-wave-of-startups-in-korea-flourishes-1413863946 By Updated Oct. 21, 2014 12:42 am ET SEOUL –The trading debut of South Korea’s ubiquitous mobile messaging app maker Daum Kakao this month made an instant multi-billionaire of one of its founders, Kim Beom-soo. But the 48-year-old Mr. Kim, whose stake in the company is now worth about $3.2 billion, is just the most prominent in a growing circle of Korean startup founders who have found success selling their young companies in recent months.
